ComicInfo.Summary:
Everybody is kung fu fighting! In fact, it's a little bit frightening! “Furious Road” reaches its action-packed, grindhouse climax as Ash and his allies – including the Frankenstein's Monster, The Daughter of Dracula, and her infamous father – team up with a monastery full of Motor City Shaolin monks against The General and his demonic Army of Darkness in a last-ditch attempt to save the world… or at least themselves! Oh-ho-ho-hoh–HA!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | Gabriel Hardman | 1 | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Gabriel Hardman | 2 |
